author: amaltaro
body:
In addition to updating the WMCore services to `2.0.0.pre3`, it also brings in:
* new dependency added to reqmgr2ms, which now depends on `py3-dbs3-client` as well
* an update to the Python3 pycurl library, from `7.43.0.3` to `7.43.0.6`, which seems to have some important fixes and enhancements for CentOS and Python3.8, see notes: http://pycurl.io/docs/latest/release-notes.html
* bumped version of wmcorepy3-devtools, to reflect the new `mongomock` dependency. 
* build a new wmagentpy3 docker image with `2.0.0.pre3`

FYI @belforte @todor-ivanov
title: WMCore release candidate for HG2202: 2.0.0.pre3; Py3 pycurl minor update
